item.description: Join us for dinner just steps away from the beautiful and historic Guilford Green with it's traditional Christmas lights. We will be seated at 7:30 PM at Quattro's - a highly rated Italian Restaurant, here's the link: http://www.quattrosit... A few of us plan on meeting at the Guilford Stone House for drinks beforehand at 6:30. I must get a final headcount to the restaurant by 5 PM on December 16th so please RSVP early and if your plans change I must know. Thankyou.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Quattro - on the Guilford Green ( almost )
